description: Application to modify a planning obligation (S106 Agreement) dated 12 September 2018 following a grant of planning permission Ref P2017/3103/FUL. The modifications sought are to acknowledge the transfer of a small parcel of land from the 20 Ropemaker development site to the neighbouring site (Finsbury Dials).
decision_conditions: REASON: Although the parcel this amendment relates to sits within the land bound by the Section 106 Agreement, no development has been, or will be carried out in this area and it is not relevant to the performance of, or compliance with, any of the Section 106 obligations. It is therefore not considered that including a new Schedule which confirms this parcel of land is no longer bound by the S106 Agreement would result in a material change to the approved development, nor would it impact the S106 Agreement's ability to secure the necessary obligations to offset the impacts of the development.
